title: Game-Based Elementary Geometry Instructional Design: Mobile Microlearning for Critical Thinking Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic geometric shapes (triangles, quadrilaterals) and general knowledge of elementary mathematics curriculum
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in game-based learning design within mobile environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can create instructional materials explaining elementary geometric concepts by applying game-based learning design principles
Learners can design three or more game mechanics (problem-solving, reasoning, modeling) that promote critical thinking in mobile microlearning environments
Learners can develop geometry learning scenarios in real-life contexts using the RME (Realistic Mathematics Education) approach
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
